name: Dreamsky Demo Level
description:
On Christmas Eve of 1992, Joel takes his girlfriend Ruth to the yearly Christmas market. At the market they encounter a stand where a robot makes them hot chocolate. As they enjoy their date, a blizzard strikes their town, causing Joel to be separated from Ruth. The Robot is the only one who saw what happened to Ruth when Joel lost consciousness. As the Robot tries to find his way back to the market and Joel searches for Ruth, the two must form an unlikely partnership to save what they hold dear.  

This build is a prototype and does not represent the final iteration of the game. The game's controls are point and click.
